answers.answer: 38 Days Until My Due Date
3 days left for me! Having a c section
190 days hope they start going faster
Congratulations! 24 days left tell my c-section. I wish it would fly by faster.
Mine is going by sooo fast with all these extra Dr apts,  two children at home, and work. I mean the month of September flew by! Cant believe only a week away from Oct!  Woot

I have 15 days left till my due date I'm so excited. I also have 3 kids at home my daughter's 10 an 5 an my handsome lil man who is 21 months. An also go every Tuesday for nst test an Wednesday to ob appointment an Friday for bpp sonograms. So it's going by pretty fast cuz Monday an Thursday is the only days I really have time to completely clean. An I'm trying to potty Tran my youngest too. An he's not to ok with it it but I finally got him to stop crying wen I do it. We sing songs lol
I have another 24 days! My first child arrived a day before EDD.
I have 179 left baby due in March I wish these day's would go by faster....
I've got 23 days left, but I'm ready right now. I can't get comfortable, I pee every 30 min.

48 days left for me due the 18 of nov but I have scheduled csection so nov 11 my second baby girl and my last. Tubes will be tied and ill have my huge cyst removed and ill probably lose my ovary. I had preeclampsia with my first baby  she's now two. I almost lost her and my life. Had four seziures but were doing great with the second baby. Just aneimic
So great for you ladis I have 10 weeks left so time really feels slow for me but I know it will be all worth it to see her little face.
I'm on 89 days left
84 days left!  Patiently waiting for my second little girl!
I have 3 days left until my due date. I'm so ready to see her
11 Days left.. Yay !
95 long days left. Hopefully she comes s little earlier
82 days left for me!! I can't wait!!!
Hola, Im so excited I just found out I'm having a girl. I have 20 more weeks and exactly 137 day before I meet my first born.
66 days for me! So inpatient, but I know it's time to get some rest as much as possible with 2 yo in a house))
I have 18 day's left. But don't think she going to wait until the 15th.

question: I believe the last time I posted a count down I had 80 days left. Now it's 59! Well until my due date. I will be getting induced so I'll have a exact date Thursday once I see my Dr.  So suh-weet!!  How much longer for you lady's???
title: 59 days!
